data.lyric:
[ti:Only Wanna Be With You (Pokémon 25 Version)]
[ar:Post Malone]
[al:Only Wanna Be With You (Pokémon 25 Version)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Only Wanna Be With You (Pokémon 25 Version) - Post Malone
[00:07.07]Lyrics by：Darius Rucker/Dean Felber/Jim Sonefeld/Mark Bryan
[00:14.14]Composed by：Darius Rucker/Dean Felber/Jim Sonefeld/Mark Bryan
[00:21.21]You and me we come from different worlds
[00:25.71]You like to laugh at me when I look at other girls
[00:30.46]Sometimes you're crazy then you wonder why
[00:35.37]I'm such a baby 'cause the cowboys make me cry
[00:39.42]Well there's nothing I can do
[00:43.31]I've been looking for a girl like you
[00:50.38]You look at me you've got nothing left to say
[00:54.94]I moan and pout at you until I get my way
[01:00.15]I won't dance you won't sing
[01:04.75]I just wanna love you but you wanna wear my ring
[01:08.87]Well there's nothing I can do
[01:12.73]I only wanna be with you
[01:18.56]You can call me your fool
[01:22.67]I only wanna be with you
[01:29.27]Put on a little Dylan sitting on a fence
[01:34.18]I say that line is great you ask me what it meant by
[01:39.01]Said I shot a man named Gray took his wife to Italy
[01:44.01]She inherited a million bucks and when she died it came to me
[01:48.07]I can't help it if I'm lucky
[01:52.04]I only wanna be with you
[01:58.80]Ain't Bobby so cool
[02:01.84]I only wanna be with you
[02:22.31]Yeah I'm tangled up and blue
[02:26.04]I only wanna be with you
[02:32.09]You can call me your fool
[02:38.61]I only wanna be with you
[02:50.19]Sometimes I wonder if it'll ever end
[02:55.03]You get so mad at me when I go out with my friends
[02:59.84]Sometimes you're crazy then you wonder why
[03:04.86]I'm such a baby yeah the cowboys make me cry
[03:08.83]Well there's nothing I can do
[03:12.85]I only wanna be with you
[03:18.74]You can call me your fool
[03:22.55]I only wanna be with you
[03:28.31]Yeah I'm tangled up in blue
[03:32.26]I only wanna be with you
[03:42.31]I only wanna be with you
[03:52.17]I only wanna be with you
data.trans:
[ti:Only Wanna Be With You (Pokémon 25 Version)]
[ar:Post Malone]
[al:Only Wanna Be With You (Pokémon 25 Version)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:07.07]//
[00:14.14]//
[00:21.21]你和我 我们来自不同的世界
[00:25.71]当我看其他女孩 你会嘲笑我
[00:30.46]有时你很疯狂 然后你想知道为什么
[00:35.37]我是如此孩子气  因为牛仔都会让我哭泣
[00:39.42]但我什么都不能做
[00:43.31]我一直在寻找像你一样的女孩
[00:50.38]你看着我 没有什么可以说的了
[00:54.94]我嘟起嘴 直到我的目的达到了
[01:00.15]我不会跳舞 你不会唱歌
[01:04.75]我只是想爱你  但你想戴上我的戒指
[01:08.87]但我什么都不能做
[01:12.73]我只想和你在一起
[01:18.56]你可以叫我傻瓜
[01:22.67]我只想和你在一起
[01:29.27]放着Dylan的歌 坐在栅栏边
[01:34.18]我说歌词不错 你问我是什么意思
[01:39.01]我说我射杀了一个叫Gray的人 带着他的妻子去意大利
[01:44.01]她继承了一百万美元 当她去世后 我便能得到那笔财富
[01:48.07]好运气挡不住
[01:52.04]我只想和你在一起
[01:58.80]Bobby 也不是很酷
[02:01.84]我只想和你在一起
[02:22.31]忧伤纠缠着我
[02:26.04]我只想和你在一起
[02:32.09]你可以叫我傻瓜
[02:38.61]我只想和你在一起
[02:50.19]有时我在想我们会一直走下去吗
[02:55.03]当我和我的朋友出去时你会大发雷霆
[02:59.84]有时你很疯狂 然后你想知道为什么
[03:04.86]我是如此孩子气  牛仔都会让我哭泣
[03:08.83]但我什么都不能做
[03:12.85]我只想和你在一起
[03:18.74]你可以叫我傻瓜
[03:22.55]我只想和你在一起
[03:28.31]忧伤纠缠着我
[03:32.26]我只想和你在一起
[03:42.31]我只想和你在一起
[03:52.17]我只想和你在一起
